works.description:
An article on how to write search engine optimized blog posts, (maintaining the standard mentioned by Google through various articles, videos etc. : it is to emphasize that the article does show any shortcut to get rapid search engine ranking or Black Hat SEO methods) which was published on 26th of June 2011, has been copied and published by the below mentioned website on 12th of July 2011, including the internal links within the article, formatting style. Some sentences, however has been deleted to make it shorter.

Additional Note: Kindly hover over the hyperlinks "Blogger" and "using Google Analytics to track visitors behavior on your blog" in the copied text : you will be able to see internal linking of the original article and anchor texts.

An article on SEO, which was published on 5th of July 2011, has been copied and published by the below mentioned website on 12th of July 2011, including the internal links within the article, formatting style. All 15 points are copied.

Additional Note: Original Source URL is already showing at the bottom of the copied article, those are generated by third party copy protection tool; i.e. Tynt.
